appDesc.message: Collect and edit videos from YouTube playlists using a Google Sheet.

errorSpreadsheetNotFound.message: The Google Sheet 'YouTube 2-Way Playlists' was not found. Please run 'Process Playlists' first to create it.

popupExplanation.message: Paste one YouTube playlist link (or ID) per line.

textareaPlaceholder.message: Leave empty to process ALL playlists...

manualContent.message:
How does it work?
This extension has two main functions:

  1. Process Playlists: Fetches your YouTube playlists and saves them to a Google Sheet named 'YouTube 2-Way Playlists'. In the text area, paste one or more YouTube playlist links (or just the IDs), one per line. Leave the field empty to fetch all of your playlists.
  2. Upload to YouTube: Reads the Google Sheet and modifies your YouTube playlists. New tabs will become new playlists. Deleted rows will become deleted videos. New rows will become new videos.

Important notes:

  • 'Liked Videos': This special playlist cannot be modified through this tool. The 'Liked Videos' tab will therefore be skipped during the upload.
  • Order: Changing the order of videos in the Sheet is currently not synchronized to YouTube. New videos are always added to the end of the playlist.
  • Own Sheets: The extension works exclusively with the Google Sheet that was created by this tool. If you rename, delete, or make a copy of the Sheet, the 'Upload to YouTube' button will no longer work.

errorGetToken.message: Could not get a new token. Check browser console for details.

errorNoPlaylistsFound.message: No playlists found on your YouTube account.

noteWatchLater.message: Note: YouTube does not allow access to 'Watch Later'.

noteSpecialPlaylists.message: Note: Special playlists (like 'Liked videos') could not be retrieved.

warningSkippedLikes.message: Info: The 'Liked Videos' tab will be skipped. This playlist cannot be managed via the API.
